name: Cartoon for the Head of Saint James
description: Cartoon for the Head of Saint James; Sebastiano del Piombo (Italian, about 1485 - 1547); Italy; about 1520; Black and white chalk, on two joined sheets of tan paper; silhouetted; pricked for transfer; 30.2 × 30.5 cm (11 7/8 × 12 in.); 82.GB.107; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Cartoon for the Head of Saint James
medium: Black and white chalk, on two joined sheets of tan paper; silhouetted; pricked for transfer
